Roles.name: Mother
Roles.description: Wife, Mother and works full time

Roles.name: Mother
Roles.description: Takes primary responsibility for caregiving and discipline within the household.

Roles.name: Father
Roles.description: Frequently absent, contributing less to the daily family management and engagement.

Roles.name: Teenage Daughter
Roles.description: Shows increasing resistance to household rules as part of her developmental stage.

Roles.name: Grandmother
Roles.description: Provides emotional support to the family, helping to stabilize the family dynamic.

Rules.name: Curfew Policy
Rules.description: The daughter is required to be home by 10pm.

Rules.name: No Phones at Dinner Rule
Rules.description: Phones are not allowed at the dinner table for any family member.

Rules.name: Chore Completion Rule
Rules.description: Screen time privileges are contingent upon completion of assigned chores.

Rules.name: Decision Making Hierarchy
Rules.description: The mother has the ultimate authority over decisions related to schooling.
